entry.title: WIND WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:27 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -1.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to flurries this morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
